unittitle_ssm: Williamsburgh City Fire Insurance Company policy to Theodore F. Jackson
abstract_ssm: Fire insurance policy issued to Theodore F. Jackson from the Williamsburgh City Fire Insurance Company, dated May 1, 1899.  The policy was for a theater at 778-774 Driggs Avenue, between Third and Smith Streets.  Theodore F. Jackson (1830-1913) was a prominent lawyer in the Brooklyn neighborhood of Williamsburg.
